author: Ryan Daws
description:
Snap has detailed its latest OS, new AI tools, and more as it gets closer to the launch of its next-gen Specs launch in 2026. The announcements – made during the company’s fifth annual developer conference ‘Lens Fest’ – was accompanied by the launch of Snap Cloud, a backend infrastructure designed to support more complex […]

The post Snap preps for 2026 Specs AR glasses with new OS and AI tools appeared first on Developer Tech News.
title: Snap preps for 2026 Specs AR glasses with new OS and AI tools
